chapter.title: Databases Essential to Cyrus IMAP
chapter.para: It is important to know which databases are essential to Cyrus' operation, and thus to not delete, and / or backup so that Cyrus IMAP can be restored. Additionally, when migrating between a 32-bit and a 64-bit system, some database technologies like Berkely DB won't simply convert and sometimes a db_dump / db_load won't help.
